Ahmedabad, India
Data Science Intern



Remote (New York, US)
Software Developer Intern

processing techniques to generate weak labels for unlabeled images using color transformations and edge detection algorithms


{"title": "ACADEMIC PROJECTS", "content": "Stock Market Price Prediction using Vision Transformer
Sep 2023 – Dec 2023

Pioneered the application of Vision Transformers in predicting stock market prices, leveraging the GenAI's self-attention
mechanisms to capture intricate temporal relationships in financial time series data

Converted the numerical market data into spatial mappings/images for Indian stock market entities, to surpass the traditional
Transformer models (akin to attention mechanism in LLMs) in predictive accuracy and conducted thorough research and
experimentation to optimize vision transformer architectures for more effective and efficient stock market price forecasting
Music Genre Classification using Textual Lyrics Analysis
Oct 2023 – Nov 2023

Secured 2nd place at NEU’s Hackathon by architecting an advanced model using ML, DL, and NLP on vast textual lyrics data

Engineered a comprehensive preprocessing pipeline involving basic text processing (eg. Stopword removal) and word embedding
techniques like word2vec to transform textual lyrics into a structured format, enabling precise music genre predictions

Crafted an innovative strategy combining ensemble models and deep architectures, conducting thorough experimentation for precise
music genre prediction; resulted in outstanding performance and recognition
Image-to-Image Translation
Aug 2022 – Dec 2022

Researched and analyzed of various Generative Adversarial Network (GAN) variants such as Conditional GAN (CGAN) and
CycleGAN for addressing image-to-image translation problems

Engineered a novel application to generate 3D animated action figures from 2D images, with potential applications in automating
the creation of animated movies based on comics and improved the existing solution by combining various modeling methodologies
and adapting loss functions from state-of-the-art solutions
Singer Identification from the Bollywood Songs
Jan 2022 – Apr 2022

Curated a diverse dataset with 1000+ songs across 5 genres and 10 singers, establishing a foundation for Bollywood songs Dataset

Enhanced feature space by segregating vocals and instrumentals, removing ineffective information and extracting key features like
MFCC, LFCC, and RFCC. Achieved 89% accuracy in singer classification using a data-driven ML framework, accommodating
diverse genres and artists"}
